author: H ""Quality Matters""

review: Let me preface this review by saying that I'm a huge Apple fan, a shareholder, and supporter. I learned how to use computers on an Apple II, I've had Apple PCs or laptops for work or fun for the past 17+ years. I have 4 iPads in the house right now and, between my wife and I, we've had one or more of every generation iPhone. I even bought a Time Capsule last Christmas when I bought our new 27" iMac.I bought Apple TV because my friend had one and loved it. It was good for streaming content to his TV and music to his stereo. I needed the same for my house so I purchased the latest version about 9 months ago. Since I've owned it, there hasn't been one time where I've turned it on and it's worked as I expected. It either needs updated account into, it needs updated firmware, or it straight up doesn't work. Never have I hated an Apple product until this one. It's really frustrating because when my kids want to watch movies or TV content from Apple TV, it ALWAYS fails to work properly for one reason or another.I know why Apple treats Apple TV like an afterthought--it's because it sucks.
author: D. Wood "ATL"
